name: Dodgeball (itch)
description:
A dodgeball simulation game where you must avoid incoming dodgeballs and obstacles to proceed to the next level. Each level provides a challenge that the player must overcome in order to proceed to the final level. Only then can you score any points whatsoever. If you fail before then, you must go back to the very beginning.

DODGE OR DIE!

Instructions:

Use arrow keys to move.

Avoid dodgeballs and obstacles.

Survive the challenges and reach the final level to score points.

Collect the coins in the final level to score points.
